page.title: 19Social Concerns in Langho 1
page.content: Unemployment around Langho and Wilpshire is a major social concern . Employment among the middle-age group is fairly stable though bankrupcy is sadly becoming more frequent . Children leaving school or collage have great difficulty finding employment which leaves them prey to another great problem : drugs . Parents in the area fear the possibility of their children taking drugs more than any other evil . Police warnings that nearby Blackburn is a hot-bed of drug activity puts parents on their guard but they are frustrated by their real difficulties in perceiving how to combat the threat .
